description: A customizable input label component. The component supports a `<slot>` for injecting additional custom content inside the label, such as icons or formatted text

properties.name: forId
properties.description: The `for` attribute of the label, matching the `id` of the associated input.

properties.name: labelText
properties.description: The text to display within the label.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Whether the label indicates a required field.

properties.name: subLabelText
properties.description: The text rendered beneath the label.
